summary: This document is an email chain from June 2019 among U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) staff discussing a Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) request related to Jeffrey Epstein. The emails reveal confusion about the request's venue and mention a covert criminal investigation into Epstein that was not widely known within the office.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Subject of investigation and FOIA request
persons.context: The email chain discusses a FOIA request and a covert criminal investigation related to him.

events.title: FOIA request review regarding Epstein investigation
events.description: A FOIA request relating to the Epstein investigation is being processed by the civil division of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, causing confusion among staff.

keyFacts: A covert criminal investigation into Jeffrey Epstein was being conducted by the SDNY as of June 2019, and it was not widely known even among assistant U.S. attorneys.
A FOIA request related to the Epstein investigation was being processed by the civil division of the SDNY, causing confusion about why it was venued there.
The email chain indicates a lack of cross-communication between the criminal and civil divisions regarding the Epstein investigation and related FOIA requests.
